title: Vel'koz is gonna be nerfed now...

embed.description: The Glorious and Righteous Health'Koz. Vel'koz build guides on MOBAFire. League of Legends Premiere Vel'koz Strategy Builds and Tools.

body: This build is just too OP, it stomps everyone no matter what. Like, Riot will probably just destroy Vel'koz since he is too OP like that.
